title: sighting
description: The Sighting object describes something (an event) that the producer would like to provide or request additional context about.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `sighting`.

sighting_of_ref.description: An ID reference to the object that has been sighted.

where_sighted_refs.description: The ID of the Identity objects of the entities that saw the sighting.
